scripts.build: npm run build-js; npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: for FILE in "bbf-validators" "bbf-validators-pl"; do uglifyjs dist/${FILE}.js --output dist/${FILE}.min.js --compress --mangle; done
scripts.build-docs: pug --out docs templates/*.pug; find dist/ ! -name "*.min.js" -type f -exec cp -t docs/ {} +
